thread.title: South Korean Political Star Resigns Following Rape Allegation

author: Andrew Jeong
title: South Korean Political Star Resigns Following Rape Allegation
text:
SEOUL—A rising star in South Korea’s ruling party, widely tipped as a top candidate to be South Korea’s next president, resigned from office on Tuesday after one of his female aides accused him of raping her four times over the past year.
The accusations against Ahn Hee-jung, a provincial governor who finished as the runner-up to Moon Jae-in, now the president, in last year’s presidential primaries, have stunned the country’s political establishment, dominating local headlines even as a senior delegation of South Korean officials...
